sentence.value: Nikolay Nikolayevich Rukavishnikov (Russian: ???????? ??????????? ?????????????; September 18, 1932 – October 19, 2002) was a Soviet cosmonaut who flew three space missions of the Soyuz programme: Soyuz 10, Soyuz 16, and Soyuz 33.

sentence.value: Two of these missions, Soyuz 10 and Soyuz 33 were intended to dock with Salyut space stations, but failed to do so.
sentence.annotated-sentence: Two of these missions, [[Soyuz 10|Soyuz_10]] and [[Soyuz 33|Soyuz_33]] were intended to [[dock|DOCK]] with Salyut [[space stations|Space_station]], but failed to do so.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Two of these missions, [[Soyuz 10|Soyuz_10]] and [[Soyuz 33|Soyuz_33]] were intended to dock with Salyut space stations, but failed to do so.

sentence.value: Rukavishnikov studied at the Moscow Engineering and Physics Institute and after graduation worked for Sergey Korolev's design bureau.
sentence.annotated-sentence: Rukavishnikov studied at [[the Moscow Engineering and Physics Institute|National_Research_Nuclear_University]] and after [[graduation|Graduation]] worked for [[Sergey Korolev|Sergei_Korolev]]'s [[design|Design]] bureau.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Rukavishnikov studied at the Moscow Engineering and Physics Institute and after graduation worked for Sergey Korolev's design bureau.

sentence.value: He was selected for cosmonaut training in 1967.
sentence.annotated-sentence: He was selected for cosmonaut [[training|Training]] in [[1967|1967]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: He was selected for cosmonaut training in 1967.

sentence.value: Rukavishnikov became the 50th human to fly in space on April 23, 1971, the launch date of Soyuz 10.
sentence.annotated-sentence: [[Rukavishnikov|Nikolay_Rukavishnikov]] became the 50th human to fly in [[space|Space]] on April 23, 1971, the launch date of [[Soyuz 10|Soyuz_10]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Rukavishnikov|Nikolay_Rukavishnikov]] became the 50th human to fly in space on April 23, 1971, the launch date of [[Soyuz 10|Soyuz_10]].

sentence.value: He subsequently resigned from the space programme in 1987 and returned to work for the same bureau he started with, by then known as Energia.
sentence.annotated-sentence: He subsequently resigned from [[the space programme|Human_spaceflight]] in [[1987|1987]] and returned to work for the same bureau he started with, by then known as [[Energia|Energia]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: He subsequently resigned from the space programme in 1987 and returned to work for the same bureau he started with, by then known as Energia.
